questions.question_text: In order to gain organization-wide support for an information security program, which of the following is MOST important to consider?

choices.C: Clarity of security roles and responsibilities

choices.B: Update business impact analyses (BIAs) on a regular basis.
choices.C: Review and update emergency contact lists.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The best way to ensure the business continuity plan (BCP) is current is to conduct periodic testing (Option D). Regular testing helps identify any weaknesses or gaps in the plan, ensures that all components are up-to-date, and verifies that employees are familiar with their roles and responsibilities during a disruption
